description: The DVD featured never-before-seen footage from the Lennon/Ono archive, rare newsreel and private footage, 15 new and newly remastered music videos, 5.1 surround sound, new animations of Lennon's drawings and an extensive photo ga...
name: Lennon Legend: The Very Best of John Lennon

review.name: A beautiful film about John Lennon and Yoko Ono
review.reviewBody: This is just the most beautiful film you can think of that shows real love. You'll start to cry several times during it, because it's so strong. It is not many facts about John Lennon or so, it's not that kind of film, but it includes all of his and Yoko's hits and so many wonderful pictures of them; films that John has taped himself and that others have taped on him. You really get many feelings of this DVD, and I'm not a person who normally gets very emotional! Anyhow, it's really great to watch it and even though there isn't anyone telling a story in the background, you still feel like you get to know so much about John and Yoko.
